comments:
I have changed the config.ini and the swt plugin as said in the bug report #148614.

Thanks to these modifications, I am capable of launching demos but I have
experienced some problems : 

1) I can't see the view "preferences", nothing appears on the screen when I
select "preferences" and this log is generated

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-08-24 14:34:43.546
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-08-24 14:34:43.593
!MESSAGE Subclassing not allowed
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Subclassing not allowed
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(Unknown Source)

        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)

        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Unknown Source)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Unknown Source)

This error appears both on emulator and on the phone.

2) I can't exit the application properly.

On the phone, this message appears :
Programme : J9 VM Thread
Code de Motif  : KERN-EXEC
Numero de motif : 0

Moreover after this error message, the application isn't closed, it must be closed manually.

On the emulator, the emulator is closed by Windows XP when I try to exit.

This second problem does not generate any log.

There is a third problem. Concerning the update manager, the choice between "Install new applications/Features", "Update all applications/features" and "manage Applications/features" must be done by pushing a button. It works well on adapted device (like PDA) but it is not possible to use Button on a phone. Buttons simply don't appear.
I suggest to replace these buttons by Commands in order to make Update Manager work on every kinds of devices.
I have just updated to eRCP-RC1 and I'm still noticing the same problems with the same error logs.
The fix for this issue is not released yet.
fix dropped to HEAD, WorkbenchPreferenceDialog still needs to overwrite checksubclass() passing to Mark for further fixes.
Change to eJFace PreferenceDialog has been made. Gorkem, please test against S80 implementation.
